onSuccess.displayText:
{Player} willingly follows {Knight1} to {Capital1}. This long journey would take at least two whole months, during which, {Player} learns some rudimentary language skills from his fellow travelers.

However, just before the escort could reach their destination, they were attacked by a {Monster2}, an aggressive magical beast with the body of a lion, and the head and wings of an eagle. During this attack, the {Monster2} killed all of the escorting men, gravely wounded {Knight1}, and tore a large hole in the cage where {Player} was held.
